name: Super Sushi Circuit
description:
Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare  47 game jam.

Theme: "Stuck in a loop".

Grab some delicious sushi at the sushi bar ... if you can.  The sushi is super fast and the other patrons are hungry too. Can you grab all the sushi you want without overeating?

Controls

Mouse - click on the Grab Button to get the sushi in front of you.

UI

Next: The sushi you want to grab.

Left: Amount of correct sushi you have to grab until level finished.

X: Amount of wrong sushi you grabbed.

Credits

Programming, Design, Art :  Tayo

Assets used:

Music : Jazzy Blues by 3uhox

SFX : Creature SFX by rubberduck
